summary:
The second time a `contest <http://pymove3d.pysv.org/>`__ for schoolar
students is organized by the Python Software Verband e.V.. It is about
to write a Python program that is executable in Blender using its 3D
capabilities. The talk overall gives an overview what experience we got
by these ideas and how we want to continue.
title: pymove3D - Python moves the world - Attractive programming for young people
